verbs.description: [ARG1: red sox fan] [V: arrested] [ARG2: for throwing beer can at alex cora daughter at parade] a boston red sox fan has been arrested and charged with assault and battery by means of a dangerous weapon after throwing an opened beer can at alex cora and his daughter during wednesday world series parade according to a cbs boston report boston municipal court alex cora boston red sox patrick connolly red sox
